Description: Stores information about the different companies,including a unique name,  how is it related to an event that is happening, their revenue, number of employees, company's phone number, founding year, address, industry it is related to , its overview . Linked to events table using 'event_url' column which is unique and is also linked to people table using 'homepage_base_url' column, which is unique.

Contains details of all the events that are happening, including event_name, event_start_date, event_end_date, venue where is it happening , event_country, event_description, and event_url which can identify an event uniquely.

Stores information of all the employees, including first_name, middle_name, last_name, job_title, person_city where he/she resides, person_state, person_country, email_pattern as a way to construct the email, homepage_base_url is the company's url from which this person can be linked to the company table.
